I don't know . . . but I"m fairly certian it wasn't me! (I never
even got it back in my inbox . . . and after logging on to the
website I found a few posts that were never forwarded, either. :-( )

Anyway, sorry it chose you to pick on!!!

--L.

messages.subject: Mail problems (was: Re: phil's playing around again)
messages.msgSnippet: I haven t had messages come THAT many times, but I ve been getting messages from several of my yahoogroups two and three times... not all of them, just a few,
messages.messageBody:
I haven't had messages come THAT many times, but I've been getting
messages from several of my yahoogroups two and three times... not
all of them, just a few, but still...

I'll send an e-mail to yahoo again and ask what's going on. Some
messages are repeating, some I'm not even getting at all in my
mailbox. If I want to stay caught up, I'm having to go to the list
sites to read new messages.

phil

messages.subject: Re: phil's playing around again
messages.msgSnippet: I m *SOOOO* thankful, I could kiss you, Barb!!  I was already dreading having to learn how to futz with the Netscape/IE dimension. Nice to know they re getting
messages.messageBody:
I'm *SOOOO* thankful, I could kiss you, Barb!! I was already
dreading having to learn how to futz with the Netscape/IE dimension.
Nice to know they're getting along.

Corrections have been made (thanks to some of you guys catching them
for me), additions (new Mibugishiden shots and some RK manga images
are up) and links corrected/added (Black Faery's RK screencap site
and Kevin's bakumatsu site --- thanks Kevin!!)

My apologies to you PMK fans out there... I slept most of the day
away & never got around to emailing people about getting scans &
screencaps. It'll get done soon.

It'll be a work in progress for some time, so come by & check it out
occasionally. Donations always welcome. (Where's my Saitou beer???)

phil

messages.subject: phil's playing around again
messages.msgSnippet: I ve been meaning to learn html for some time, but knew that it was pointless to even approach it until I was really ready.  I suddenly got ready... :-) It is
messages.messageBody:
I've been meaning to learn html for some time, but knew that it was pointless to even approach it until I was really ready. I suddenly got ready... :-)

It is a LONG way from finished... needs some tweaking in various spots... no manga images yet (just received them a few minutes ago) and no PMK yet (going after permissions tomorrow)... and a couple of links need looking into. It also hasn't been tested on Netscape yet as Netscape isn't loaded on my computer and I can't get to my husband's until he's finished blowing up things in his online game.

This is my first time creating and loading a website, so it's very experimental. The font size is smaller than I want it in some places... lots and lots more to learn. I wanted to do something related to Saitou, so I chose to collect images. I owe many thanks to Tiffany and Kevin for helping me today... especially Tiffany for giving me that little extra push over the side to do it. Comments and complaints welcome.

http://www.geocities.com/spiritus_saitou

phil (who's about decided RK Saitou deserves a site all his very own... ever try to pick "just a few" from among hundreds? I should make it a revolving gallery...)
